mapper.sql: SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PASSWORD, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_NAME, MEM_PHONE, STATUS, MEM_IMG_ORIGINAL, MEM_IMG_RENAME, MEM_DATE, CATE_NO FROM MEMBER
SELECT LIKE_NO, HB_NO, MEM_NO, STATUS FROM LIKED

SELECT HB_NO, MER_NO, CATE_NO, HB_TITLE, HB_SUMMARY, HB_STARTDATE, HB_FEE, HB_DISCOUNT_RATE, HB_DISCOUNT_STATUS, HB_ENDDATE, HB_IMGS_ORI, HB_IMGS_RENAME, HB_THUM_ORI, HB_THUM_RENAME, HB_INFO, HB_LOCATION FROM HOBBY WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT RES_NO, HB_NO, MEM_NO, RES_NAME, RES_PHONE, RES_COUNT, RES_DATE, TAKE_DATE, PAY_FEE, RES_ATTEND, RES_STATUS FROM RESERVE WHERE RES_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PASSWORD FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_PHONE = #{memPhone} AND STATUS ='Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PASSWORD, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_NAME, MEM_PHONE, STATUS, MEM_IMG_ORIGINAL, MEM_IMG_RENAME, MEM_DATE, CATE_NO ) VALUES( SEQ_MEM_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memId}, #{memPassword}, #{memEmail}, #{memName}, #{memPhone}, DEFAULT, #{memImgOriginal}, #{memImgRename}, DEFAULT, #{cateNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_IMG_ORIGINAL = #{memImgOriginal}, MEM_IMG_RENAME = #{memImgRename}, MEM_NAME = #{memName}, MEM_PHONE = #{memPhone}, MEM_EMAIL = #{memEmail} WHERE MEM_NO = #{memNo}
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS='N' WHERE MEM_NO = #{memNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT H.HB_NO, H.MER_NO, H.CATE_NO, C.CATE_NAME, H.HB_TITLE, H.HB_SUMMARY, H.HB_STARTDATE, H.HB_FEE, H.HB_DISCOUNT_RATE, H.HB_DISCOUNT_STATUS, H.HB_ENDDATE, H.HB_IMGS_ORI, H.HB_IMGS_RENAME, H.HB_THUM_ORI, H.HB_THUM_RENAME, H.HB_INFO, H.HB_LOCATION FROM HOBBY H JOIN CATEGORY C ON(H.CATE_NO = C.CATE_NO) WHERE H.STATUS = 'Y'
ORDER BY H.HB_NO DESC

SELECT H.HB_NO, H.MER_NO, H.CATE_NO, C.CATE_NAME, H.HB_TITLE, H.HB_SUMMARY, H.HB_STARTDATE, H.HB_FEE, H.HB_DISCOUNT_RATE, H.HB_DISCOUNT_STATUS, H.HB_ENDDATE, H.HB_IMGS_ORI, H.HB_IMGS_RENAME, H.HB_THUM_ORI, H.HB_THUM_RENAME, H.HB_INFO, H.HB_LOCATION FROM HOBBY H JOIN CATEGORY C ON(H.CATE_NO = C.CATE_NO) JOIN LIKED L ON(H.HB_NO = L.HB_NO) WHERE L.MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND H.STATUS = 'Y'
ORDER BY H.HB_NO DESC

SELECT H.HB_NO, H.MER_NO, H.CATE_NO, C.CATE_NAME, H.HB_TITLE, H.HB_SUMMARY, H.HB_STARTDATE, H.HB_FEE, H.HB_DISCOUNT_RATE, H.HB_DISCOUNT_STATUS, H.HB_ENDDATE, H.HB_IMGS_ORI, H.HB_IMGS_RENAME, H.HB_THUM_ORI, H.HB_THUM_RENAME, H.HB_INFO, H.HB_LOCATION FROM HOBBY H JOIN CATEGORY C ON(H.CATE_NO = C.CATE_NO) JOIN RESERVE R ON(H.HB_NO = R.HB_NO) WHERE R.MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND H.STATUS = 'Y' AND R.RES_STATUS = 'Y'
ORDER BY R.RES_DATE DESC

SELECT R.RES_NO, R.RES_DATE, R.HB_NO, H.HB_THUM_RENAME, H.HB_TITLE, R.RES_NAME, R.RES_PHONE, R.RES_COUNT, R.TAKE_DATE, R.PAY_FEE, R.RES_STATUS FROM RESERVE R JOIN HOBBY H ON(H.HB_NO = R.HB_NO) WHERE R.MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND H.HB_NO = #{hbNo} AND H.STATUS = 'Y' AND R.RES_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOBBY WHERE STATUS='Y'
